meanings.definition: An area of land covered with sand dunes.
meanings.sent1: The family enjoyed exploring the dunelands during their vacation.
meanings.sent2: The dunelands stretched as far as the eye could see along the coast.
meanings.sent3: The children played hide-and-seek in the dunelands, burying each other in the soft sand.
meanings.sent4: The dunelands resembled a vast desert, with shifting dunes like waves frozen in time.
meanings.sent5: The sun set over the dunelands, painting the sky in shades of pink and orange.
